name: id
description: Unique identifier for the ad campaign

name: account_id
description: Reference to the account identifier from ad_accounts

name: bid_strategy
description: Bid strategy for the ad campaign

name: boosted_object_id
description: Boosted object identifier

name: budget_rebalance_flag
description: Flag indicating budget rebalancing

name: budget_remaining
description: Remaining budget for the ad campaign

name: buying_type
description: Buying type for the ad campaign

name: can_create_brand_lift_study
description: Flag indicating if brand lift study can be created

name: can_use_spend_cap
description: Flag indicating if spend cap can be used

name: configured_status
description: Configured status of the ad campaign

name: created_time
description: Time when the ad campaign was created

name: daily_budget
description: Daily budget for the ad campaign

name: effective_status
description: Effective status of the ad campaign

name: has_secondary_skadnetwork_reporting
description: Flag indicating secondary SKAdNetwork reporting

name: is_budget_schedule_enabled
description: Flag indicating if budget scheduling is enabled

name: is_skadnetwork_attribution
description: Flag indicating SKAdNetwork attribution

name: last_budget_toggling_time
description: Time of the last budget toggling

name: lifetime_budget
description: Lifetime budget for the ad campaign

name: name
description: Name of the ad campaign

name: objective
description: Objective of the ad campaign

name: primary_attribution
description: Primary attribution for the ad campaign

name: smart_promotion_type
description: Smart promotion type for the ad campaign

name: source_campaign_id
description: Source campaign identifier

name: special_ad_category
description: Special ad category for the ad campaign

name: spend_cap
description: Spend cap for the ad campaign

name: start_time
description: Start time of the ad campaign

name: status
description: Status of the ad campaign

name: stop_time
description: Stop time of the ad campaign

name: topline_id
description: Topline identifier

name: updated_time
description: Time when the ad campaign was last updated
